content.p: Chancellor: Baroness Young of Hornsey OBE Pro-Chancellor and Chair of the Council: Sir Keith O'Nions Treasurer: Giles Willits Pro-Chancellor: President and Vice-Chancellor: Professor Shearer West Vice-Chair of the Council: Nora Senior Provost and Deputy Vice-Chancellor: Professor Jane Norman Pro-Vice-Chancellors: Professor Sam Kingman (Interim, Research and Knowledge Exchange) Professor Sarah Speight (Education and Student Experience) Professor Robert Mokaya (Global Engagement) Professor Tom Rodden (Research and Knowledge Exchange) Pro-Vice-Chancellor and Provost, University of Nottingham Ningbo China: Professor Jon Garibaldi Pro-Vice-Chancellor and Provost, University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus: Professor Sam Kingman Faculty Pro-Vice-Chancellors: Arts: Professor Professor Jeremy Gregory Social Sciences (Interim): Professor Jeremy Gregory Science: Professor Zoe Wilson Engineering: Professor Sam Kingman Medicine and Health Sciences: Professor Sube Banerjee Registrar: Dr Paul Greatrix Chief Financial Officer: Margaret Monckton Chief Digital Officer: David Hill Director of Human Resources: Jaspal Kaur Lead Esquire Bedell: Professor Gabriele Neher Assistant Esquire Bedell: Rebecca Dewey James Bonnyman Ayoola Makinde-Ojo Lead University Marshal: Dr John Horton Assistant Marshal: James Bonnyman Ayoola Makinde-Ojo Dr Lisa Stocks Erjon Ballukja Jacqueline Andrews (updated May 2023) Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
